content.en_US:
Fluid used in the [[processing of bedrock ore|Bedrock Ore]] and the [[hydrotreater|Hydrotreater]]. Mainly produced in the [[electrolysis machine|Electrolysis Machine]] by the [[electrolysis|Electrolysis]] of water. It can also be obtained by [[radiolysis|Radiolysis]] or as a byproduct in the [[catalytic reformer|Catalytic Reformer]].

Also used in the processing of [[coltan|Coltan]], the production of [[ionic gel|Ionic Gel]] and obtaining [[heavy oil|Heavy Oil]] from coal in the [[pyrolysis oven|Pyrolysis Oven]].
